questions.title: Question 6 for Class 190920
questions.main: In Fig. 15.17 p. 449 explain why the actual rise in surface air temperature (gray line) is much less than the projected rise in air temperature due to increasing levels of greenhouse gases (yellow line).
questions.answer: The yellow line represents projected temperature increases due to the effects of greenhouse gases alone ignoring the effects of aerosols and changes in solar radiation. The grey line (actual temperatures) responds to all of these processes.

questions.title: Question 7 for Class 190920
questions.answer: A) in advance of a cold front

mcq.option: A) in advance of a cold front
D) in advance of a warm front
